mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADMIN_RESERVATION ( RESERVE_ID, MEAL_TIME, RESERVE_DATE, TIME_SLOT, CREATED_AT ) VALUES ( ADMIN_RESERVATION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mealTime}, TO_DATE(#{reserveDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{timeSlot}, SYSTIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT CUSTOMER_ID AS customerId, MEMBER_ID AS memberId, SEAT_ID AS seatId FROM CUSTOMER_RESERVATION WHERE RESERVE_ID = ( SELECT RESERVE_ID FROM ADMIN_RESERVATION WHERE RESERVE_DATE = TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TIME_SLOT = #{time} AND STATUS = 'ACTIVE' )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notification ( notification_id, customer_id, reserve_date, time_slot, message, is_read, created_at ) VALUES ( seq_notification_idSTART.NEXTVAL, #{customerId}, TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{time}, #{content}, 0, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

INSERT INTO PAYMENT_TRANSACTION ( TRANSACTION_ID, ACCOUNT_ID, TRANSACTION_TYPE, AMOUNT, TRANSACTION_DATE, CUSTOMER_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_PAYMENT_TRANSACTION_ID.NEXTVAL, #{accountId}, #{refund}, #{refundMoney}, SYSDATE, #{customerId} )
